trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the specified token request (RST) is not understood because of an unknown token type.
trans-unit.target: 未知的權杖類型，因此無法辨識指定的權杖要求 (RST) 時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The RST is represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken> object.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的 RST<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken>物件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤的屬性。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|An empty string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|空字串。 |</xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class with the specified token type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>與指定語彙基元類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the TokenType property to the specified token type URI and the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化為指定的權杖型別 URI TokenType 屬性和<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤的屬性。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|The specified token type URI.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|指定權杖的型別 URI。 |</xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the token type URI.
trans-unit.target: 包含權杖的型別 URI 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含關於來源或目的地的內容資訊的物件。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|`null`.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A>|`null`.|</xref:System.IdentityModel.UnsupportedTokenTypeBadRequestException.TokenType%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>也就是造成目前例外狀況。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If the `exception` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`exception`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the unsupported token type and other exception information.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>具有不支援的語彙基元類型和其他例外狀況資訊物件。

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 集<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>的目標為序列化的所有例外狀況物件資料。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化期間的例外狀況物件重新組成從<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>資料流上傳輸。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含關於來源或目的地的內容資訊的物件。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the unsupported token type URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定不支援的權杖型別 URI。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the unsupported token type URI.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含不支援的權杖型別 URI。
